trans-unit.source: Models a strongly typed <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> of type <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Modelos fortemente tipada <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>do tipo <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] This class is used to represent the list of child activities for a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Essa classe é usada para representar a lista de atividades filho para <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Only call methods derived from <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601> and not <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601>, such as using <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollection.Add%2A> to add activities instead of <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601.AddRange%2A>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Chamar somente métodos derivados <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601>e não <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601>, como <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollection.Add%2A>adicionar atividades em vez de <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601.AddRange%2A>.</xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601.AddRange%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollection.Add%2A> </xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601> </xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601>

trans-unit.source: Calling methods derived from <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601> will have unexpected consequences.
trans-unit.target: Chamando métodos derivados <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601>terá consequências inesperadas.</xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601>

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of members of the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número de membros de <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: The number of members of the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.
trans-unit.target: O número de membros de <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: Implements an enumeration interface to the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.
trans-unit.target: Implementa uma interface de enumeração para <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: Enumerators only enable reading the data in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Enumeradores habilite somente leitura dos dados na coleção.

trans-unit.source: You cannot use enumerators to modify the underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: Você não pode usar enumeradores para modificar a coleção subjacente.

trans-unit.source: To begin, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Para começar, o enumerador está posicionado antes do primeiro elemento na coleção.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> also brings the enumerator back to this position.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A>também traz o enumerador de volta para essa posição.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A>

trans-unit.source: At this position, calling <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>raises an exception.
trans-unit.target: AT isso posicionar, chamando <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>gera uma exceção.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you must call <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Portanto, você deve chamar <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>para avançar o enumerador para o primeiro elemento da coleção antes de ler o valor de <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> returns the same object until either <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> or <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>Retorna o mesmo objeto até que o <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>ou <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A>é chamado.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A></xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> sets <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> to the next element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>define <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>para o próximo elemento.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A></xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the end of the collection is passed, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection, and calling <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Após o final da coleção for passado, o enumerador está posicionado após o último elemento da coleção e chamada <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>retorna `false`.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the last call to <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> returned `false`, calling <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> raises an exception.
trans-unit.target: Se a última chamada <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>retornado `false`, chamar <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>gera uma exceção.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: To set `Current` to the first element of the collection again, you can call `Reset` followed by <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para definir `Current` para o primeiro elemento da coleção novamente, você pode chamar `Reset` seguido pelo <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: Um enumerador permanece válido desde que a coleção permaneça inalterada.

trans-unit.source: If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying or deleting elements, the enumerator is irreversibly invalidated and the next call to <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> or `Reset` raises an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> .
trans-unit.target: Se forem feitas alterações à coleção, como adicionar, modificar ou excluir elementos, o enumerador é invalidado irreversivelmente e a próxima chamada para <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>ou `Reset` gera um <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the collection is modified between <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> and <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>, <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> will return the element that it is set to, even if the enumerator is already invalidated.
trans-unit.target: Se a coleção é modificada entre <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>e <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>, <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>retornará o elemento que está definido como, mesmo se o enumerador já é invalidado.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: O enumerador não tem acesso exclusivo à coleção; Portanto, enumerando através de uma coleção intrinsecamente não é um procedimento de thread-safe.

trans-unit.source: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads could still modify the collection.
trans-unit.target: Mesmo quando uma coleção é sincronizada, outros threads ainda podem modificar a coleção.

trans-unit.source: This causes the enumerator to raise an exception.
trans-unit.target: Isso faz com que o enumerador gerar uma exceção.

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.
trans-unit.target: Para garantir a segurança de thread durante a enumeração, você pode bloquear a coleção durante toda a enumeração ou capture as exceções resultante de alterações feitas por outros threads.

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that can iterate through the <xref href="System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um enumerador que pode iterar por meio de <xref href="System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: In this context, adding or removing members raises the event.
trans-unit.target: Nesse contexto, adicionando ou removendo membros gera o evento.

trans-unit.source: Modifying a member does not raise this event.
trans-unit.target: Modificar um membro não gera esse evento.

trans-unit.source: When you create an <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollection> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando você cria um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollection>delegado, você identificar o método que manipulará o evento.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollection>

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Para associar o evento com o manipulador de eventos, adicione uma instância do representante ao evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador de eventos é chamado sempre que o evento ocorre, a menos que você remova o delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre delegados de manipulador de eventos, consulte [NIB: eventos e delegados](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).

trans-unit.source: Copies the elements of the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> to an <xref:System.Array>, starting at a particular <xref:System.Array> index.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array> which is the target of the copy operation.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Array>que é o destino da operação de cópia.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index within the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> where the copy starts.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether access to the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> is synchronized, that is thread-safe.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o acesso a <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> é sincronizada, que é thread-safe.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A> returns an object, which can be used to synchronize access to the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>Retorna um objeto, que pode ser usado para sincronizar o acesso <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601>.</xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601></xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>

trans-unit.source: Most collection classes in the <xref:System.Collections?displayProperty=fullName> namespace also implement a `Synchronized` method, which provides a synchronized wrapper around the underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: Coleta a maioria das classes de <xref:System.Collections?displayProperty=fullName>namespace também implementam um `Synchronized` método, que fornece um wrapper sincronizado para a coleção subjacente.</xref:System.Collections?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: Enumerar através de uma coleção intrinsecamente não é um procedimento de thread-safe.

trans-unit.source: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: Mesmo quando uma coleção é sincronizada, outros threads ainda podem modificar a coleção, o que faz com que o enumerador lançar uma exceção.

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.
trans-unit.target: Para garantir a segurança de thread durante a enumeração, você pode bloquear a coleção durante toda a enumeração ou capture as exceções resultante de alterações feitas por outros threads.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if access to the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> is synchronized, that is, thread-safe; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se acessar para o <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> é sincronizada, ou seja, thread-safe; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um objeto que pode ser usado para sincronizar o acesso a <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601>.

trans-unit.source: For collections whose underlying store is not publicly available, the expected implementation is to return the current instance.
trans-unit.target: Para coleções cujo repositório subjacente não está disponível publicamente, a implementação esperada é retornar a instância atual.

trans-unit.source: Note that the pointer to the current instance might not be sufficient for collections that wrap other collections; those should return the underlying collection <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Observe que o ponteiro para a instância atual pode não ser suficiente para coleções que agrupam outras coleções; aqueles devem retornar a coleção subjacente <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>

trans-unit.source: Most collection classes in the <xref:System.Collections?displayProperty=fullName> namespace also implement a `Synchronized` method, which provides a synchronized wrapper around the underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: Coleta a maioria das classes de <xref:System.Collections?displayProperty=fullName>namespace também implementam um `Synchronized` método, que fornece um wrapper sincronizado para a coleção subjacente.</xref:System.Collections?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: However, derived classes can provide their own synchronized version of the collection using the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollection.System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, as classes derivadas podem fornecer sua própria versão sincronizada de coleção usando o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollection.System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollection.System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>

trans-unit.source: The synchronizing code must perform operations on the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollection.System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A> property of the collection, not directly on the collection.
trans-unit.target: O código de sincronização necessário realizar operações no <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollection.System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>propriedade da coleção, não diretamente na coleção.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollection.System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>

trans-unit.source: This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects.
trans-unit.target: Isso garante que a operação correta de coleções que são derivados de outros objetos.

trans-unit.source: Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the collection instance.
trans-unit.target: Especificamente, ele mantém uma sincronização adequada com outros threads que podem ser simultaneamente modificando a instância de coleção.

trans-unit.source: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601>.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que pode ser usado para sincronizar o acesso a <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601>.

trans-unit.source: Returns an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> that iterates through the underlying <xref:System.Collections.IList>.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>que itera subjacente <xref:System.Collections.IList>.</xref:System.Collections.IList> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> only allows for reading the data in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>somente permite ler os dados na coleção.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: You cannot use an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> to modify the underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: Não é possível usar um <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>para modificar a coleção subjacente.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> that can be used to iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>que pode ser usado para iterar pela coleção.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: Adds an object to the <xref:System.Collections.IList> at the end of the <xref:System.Collections.IList>.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um objeto ao <xref:System.Collections.IList>final de <xref:System.Collections.IList>.</xref:System.Collections.IList> </xref:System.Collections.IList>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to add to the <xref:System.Collections.IList>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>Para adicionar a <xref:System.Collections.IList>.</xref:System.Collections.IList> </xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref:System.Int32>.
trans-unit.target: Retorna <xref:System.Int32>.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the <xref:System.Object> that was just added.
trans-unit.target: O índice de base zero de <xref:System.Object>que acabou de ser adicionado.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Removes all <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> from the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.
trans-unit.target: Remove todos os <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> de <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.Object> is a member of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref:System.Object>é um membro da coleção.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to locate in the <xref:System.Collections.IList>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>Para localizar em <xref:System.Collections.IList>.</xref:System.Collections.IList> </xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Returns if value is in the collection; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Retorna se value está na coleção; caso contrário, .

trans-unit.source: Gets the zero-based index of the <xref:System.Object> in the underlying activities collection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o índice de base zero de <xref:System.Object>na coleção de atividades subjacente.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to be indexed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Object>a serem indexados.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the value in the underlying activities collection or -1 if not found in the collection.
trans-unit.target: O índice de base zero de value na coleção de atividades subjacente ou -1 se não encontrado na coleção.

trans-unit.source: The value is not of type and the exception object contains "Error_InvalidListItem" error message.
trans-unit.target: O value não é do tipo e o objeto de exceção contém a mensagem de erro "Error_InvalidListItem".

trans-unit.source: Inserts an <xref:System.Object> into the <xref:System.Collections.IList> at the zero-based index specified.
trans-unit.target: Insere um <xref:System.Object>para o <xref:System.Collections.IList>no índice de base zero especificado.</xref:System.Collections.IList> </xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based position of the insertion.
trans-unit.target: A posição de base zero da inserção.

trans-unit.source: The object to insert.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a ser inserido.

trans-unit.source: It must be of type <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ele deve ser do tipo <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref:System.Collections.IList> has a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref:System.Collections.IList>tem um tamanho fixo.</xref:System.Collections.IList>

trans-unit.source: A collection with a fixed size does not allow the addition or removal of elements after the collection is created, but it allows the modification of existing elements.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção com um tamanho fixo não permite a adição ou remoção de elementos após a criação da coleção, mas permite a modificação de elementos existentes.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Collections.IList> has a fixed size; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref:System.Collections.IList>tem um fixa tamanho; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Collections.IList>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> é somente leitura.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref:System.Boolean><xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> is read-only; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Retorna <xref:System.Boolean> <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> se o <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> é somente leitura; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the activity in the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> based on the index.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a atividade de <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>com base no índice.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: Zero-based index into the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.
trans-unit.target: Índice de base zero em <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref:System.Object>, a member activity of the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>, whose index in the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> was specified in the call.
trans-unit.target: Retorna <xref:System.Object>, uma atividade de membro do <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>, cujo índice no <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>foi especificado na chamada.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection> </xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Removes the first occurrence of a specific object from the <xref:System.Collections.IList>.
trans-unit.target: Remove a primeira ocorrência de um objeto específico de <xref:System.Collections.IList>.</xref:System.Collections.IList>

trans-unit.source: The elements that follow the removed element move up to occupy the vacated spot.
trans-unit.target: Os elementos que seguem o elemento removido mover para cima para ocupar o ponto vagas.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to remove from the <xref:System.Collections.IList>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>Para remover de <xref:System.Collections.IList>.</xref:System.Collections.IList> </xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.IList> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Collections.IList>é somente leitura.</xref:System.Collections.IList>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.IList> has a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IList>tem um tamanho fixo.</xref:System.Collections.IList>
